title: Kisan Call Centre (KCC) - Transcripts of farmers queries & answers

records.KccAns: planofix ka1.0 ml/ 2 lit ka spray kara de

records.QueryText: Asking for registration in kisan call center

records.KccAns: SPRAY TO NOMINEEGOLD @ 100 ML IN 200 LITRE OF WATER/ACRE.

records.QueryText: ask about fungiside in cotton and gnut

records.KccAns: Apply MANCHOJEB  + CARBANDAJEEM @ 2.0 Grm / Lt of water

records.QueryText: HOW TO CONTROL NEMATODE IN PADDY CROP ?
Maize which is two months crop,tip portion of few plants are drying.Which chemical should be sprayed?
records.KccAns: This is due to stem borer problem.First destroy the infected plants then apply Carbaryl 4G to the tip portion of the plants @ 6 kgs/ac.

records.QueryText: bail  ka phal gir raha hai
records.KccAns: boran 4-5 gm /liter pani  ke dar se spray kare  aur   200-250 gm  boran  jad me de

records.QueryText: ASKING ABOUT WEATHER FORCASTING ?  CHANCE OF RAINFALL TODAY

records.KccAns: gronime 5 ml/10 lit. water or cypermathine 10 ml /10 lit. water

records.QueryText: tell me fangus control of gaur
records.KccAns: SPRAY OF  MANCOZEB 2 GRAM PER LIT WATER
Details is being told to farmer

records.QueryText: dhan ka paudha jalbharav ke karan sukh raha hai
records.KccAns: 20 kilogram urea+ 5 kilogram zink salphet 1000 liter pani me gholkar/hectare sprey kare
clean field, carbendisam 1g./lit jole gole. bliching powder, or chun added in the field, applied fertilizer 3-4time in a year.
Cloudy weather in your area but no chance of rain

records.QueryText: information regarding white fly in cotton?
records.KccAns: spray 80gm acetamipride and 80 gm ektara in 150 litre of water per acre.

records.QueryText: INFORMATION REGARDING WEEDS CONTROL POST EMERGENCE IN RICE ?
records.KccAns: SPRAY NOMINEE GOLD 10SC (BISPYRIBAC) @ 100ML IN 150LITRES OF WATER/ACRE , 20-25DAYS AFTER TRANSPLANTING.

records.QueryText: Death of tomato plant and rottening of plant
records.KccAns: 0.5gm Streptocyclin in 1 liter of water and spray

records.QueryText: how to control of bactirial leaf blaight in gwar?
records.KccAns: spray of streptosycleen 30gm+200 gm COC in 200 Lt water/acre.
YELLOWING OF PADDY-SPRAY SAAF 75 WP@ 1.5 GM / LITRE OF WATER

records.QueryText: ASK ABOUT CULTIVATION PRACTICES IN BETEL VINE

records.KccAns: SPRAY FIPRONIL 5% SC 1 LITER PER HA

records.QueryText: how to control thrips in cotton ?
records.KccAns: spray 300 ml rogor , 1 kg achuk , 200 litre water / acre .

records.QueryText: information regarding control of canker in apple tree
records.KccAns: clean the affected with knife . apply boardex paste or chaubtia

records.QueryText: how to control trips in cotton ?
records.KccAns: spray to confidore @ 100 ml in 150 liter of water / acre .

Spray Zinc sulphate at the rate of 0.5% (500 g/100 lit of water) thrice in a year (March, July and October) after the emergence of new flushes.
